item.title: Blizzard Promotes ‘Overwatch’ Boss Walter Kong to Head of Live Games and Mobile Development
item.description: Blizzard has promoted Walter Kong, the general manager of its “Overwatch” video game franchise, to the newly created role of head of development across all live games and mobile titles. &#
